太好玩辣！无论是逃生者还是杀手都很有意思。
作为逃生者那种被追杀的恐慌还有躲躲藏藏的紧张无疑在刺激着我的神经。虽然有时候会被杀手献祭，但被献祭前吧杀手溜得团团转真的很开心！（抱歉杀手玩家，但是这是心里话）亦或者是速修发电机让杀手心脏怦怦乱跳也是真的很快乐。那种队友只见互相扶持最后逃脱的乐趣不玩是体会不到的啊。

作为杀手，和逃生者斗智斗勇玩追逐战非常有意思呢。那种体验逃生者在死亡面前的绝望还有恐慌让我感到无比兴奋！每当我击倒逃生者后将他们抗在肩膀上都有一种“丰收”的乐趣。再把逃生者挂在钩子上最后献祭就好像”收藏战利品“一样呢，异常让我感到快乐。不过可惜的是战利品终究送给了恶灵……

黎明杀机整体来讲是款非常不错的游戏，双方各自都有着不同的技能和不同的打法，每一种新的技能匹配都可以带来新的玩法，这样可以让游戏新鲜感保持很久，也能保持住游戏乐趣。偶尔也会遇到新手杀手遇到四个老手逃生者从而被戏耍的情况，反之如此。希望游戏的匹配系统可以更进一步，匹配过程中尽量匹配相似的玩家，而不是跨阶级去匹配。这样会很快磨灭新手的游戏体验（早期我就是这样的，最近才回归）

游戏内优化不是很好（现阶段对于这个游戏来说不错，但是相比同年发售的游戏DBD没有表现的很优秀）
然后就是服务器的问题，ping不稳定，游戏内延迟过高。建议添加一个可以随时显示FPS和ping还有lose的计数器一类的功能。

感谢DBD给我这段时间带来快乐！

DBD is a very difficult game to review or recommend. On on hand, The game itself can be very fun and its learning curb for both survivors and Killers gives you a reason to keep coming back for more to master this game the best you can. On the other hand, the repeatative nature (PRIMARILY due to the fact that there is only one game mode) and the community can make the game lose it fun elements very quickly. Give it a try. It may be for you. But its HIGHLY recommended that you play with a group of friends and dont try to take the game seriously. And on the flip side, dont bully other players through game play. 3/5

The game is undeniably entertaining, and slightly fairer than one might initially expect in giving survivors chances to escape from a threat they can't physically confront. There is thrill in both the hunt and escaping the hunt. Different killers provide a lot of variation to the gameplay, and it can be fun to see some of your friends from other franchises like Ghostface.

The extra monetisation method is kinder than a play restricting phone game, but should still be considered predatory. Developers do deserve money, and these ones do continue to support their game. There are perks to make the game interesting, or help combat some of the inherent flaws in the imbalanced nature of the game - such as perks for if a killer decides they want to kill specifically you. But if you want them, you have to play forever to unlock them, or pay for them. In general the game favours those that have played longer because they have more options available to them.
To expand a little more on this - each survivor or killer comes with three unique perks. Levelling them up lets you unlock these perks to use on other characters. This.. both allows for more customisation, but in a way can also dilute some of the individuality of each character. Once you play survivors enough the person you pick is just a model switch and doesn't mean anything. While killers are still stuck with their core function, they can take perks from other killers to pick a set that provides the least potential for escape. Good in theory, cruel in practice.


Frustration is inherent in all things competitive, particularly when not clean cut mirror matches, but at the end of the day there is little in this an individual survivor can do if a killer decides on purpose or by accident that you don't get to have fun that match. The game relies on a silent agreement with most killers that they aren't going to tunnel, camp, or generally be poor sports about the chase.

At the same time, playing as killer can be similarly frustrating, and often comes with greater pressure, when against the well coordinated, or just particularly evasive. This leaves both parties feeling frustrated or running around with the notion of 'get effed'.

I will probably keep playing though, even though I've uninstalled it ~five times, because I want to play with friends, and it -can- be fun.
All in all, spent way too much money, got upset with game. Griefed myself.

Gyakorlatilag már több, mint egy éve játszom a játékkal és még mindig élvezem a meccseket, tudok izgulni, ha olyan a szituáció, hogy kijutok e vagy sem. Igaz, vannak benne camperek akik megtudják nehezíteni az ember dolgát, voltak már fűben rejtőző, guggoló randomok, akik nem csináltak egész meccsen semmit sem, hagytak a kampón meghalni, utána pedig a hatchen kimentek... De összességében még mindig leköt a játék és ez ritka. Persze vannak szünetek, de látszik, hogy foglalkoznak a játékkal és újabb cosmetikumokkal, ötletekkel bővítik a játékot. 
Ajánlani tudom mindenkinek, aki szereti a horrort és a kijutós játékokat. 
A játék morál többségében a csapattól függ, amibe kerülsz és rajtuk dől el, hogy a killer milyen.

Very fun game to play with friends, and even a game that you could grind levels for, if your into enough.  Usually playing as a survivor in the game I find that later in the day about after 8:00 P.M. matchmaking definitely isn't the best and for me can take up to 5 - 20 minutes.  On the other hand playing as a killer at any time of the day my matchmaking has been great I normally get into the game fairly quickly.  In Dead By Daylight I usually enjoy the custom matches the best because I can invite four other friends and use the best perks, choose which map to play, and get into games instantly.  I would recommend playing this game if you have at least one other person to play with, but if not it can still be enjoyable.  Before I played this game for way more hours on my PS4 but I don't have much hours at all on my PC so my opinion could be different.

If I had to rank the game I would probably say for me it's around probably 8 - 8.5, even could be a 9 in my opinion.  Many people like the game because of the exclusive characters you can play as such as Michael Myers and Laurie Strode, Leatherface, and even Freddy Krueger.  And many other great survivors and killers created by Dead By Daylight that can be great to use.  Also people enjoy for the thrill of the game.

People might not like the game because of the matchmaking at times or for the early frustration they may get when first starting, but I recommend giving it some time and getting used to the characters to truly explore the whole game and see if it's your type of game to play.

But overall in my experience I would 100% recommend this game because it has been very fun for me and is definitely one of my favorite games to this date.  And I've mainly played the game on console for almost 4 years but some gaps in there because of friends lost of interest or just not having time.  I've had many great moments playing this game that have been fun, funny, and rewarding when you win the game or unlock something hard to get.  So for the short answer yes I would definitely recommend this game to anyone looking for a game to play!

第五万场玩家，算是补票吧买的杀鸡。
首先，游戏氛围，杀鸡确实恐怖元素更浓厚一点（第一次听兔妈哼歌起一身鸡皮疙瘩），但说到底还是竞技游戏，玩多了除了碰见永一麦叔其他的也就习惯了。但是外挂确实多，我甚至遇见过昵称是一整首长恨歌的大哥。
其次，游戏机制，非常喜欢杀机这种模糊胜负机制的做法，真的能极大的提高游戏乐趣，以及在一定程度上降血压，跟第五那种纯看跑的人数算输赢的模式比娱乐性更高；配件和祭品机制也决定了第五在公平性和竞技性上更胜一筹，但是想淋漓尽致的体验娱乐和博弈还是得来杀鸡
最后，奉劝某些人，py就py，别跟第五里假佛系一样打不赢靠假py四杀

O Jogo seria bem melhor se a empresa ligasse pra ele, mesmo evento sempre, pouco pontos pra upar. Se você gostar de jogar de killer, vai sofrer por um bom tempo, porque o jogo é totalmente pra survivor, você precisa de uma build especifica pra conseguir fazer algo no jogo de killer, e o grinding pra isso é ruim, são muitas horas que você vai precisar pra conseguir montar uma build razoável. Fora que é desbalanceado, você ta começando de killer, e vai ter sempre survivors de rank alto, se vc estiver de survivor, vai ter um killer de rank alto. E se os 4 survivor estiverem jogando junto em call, é totalmente diferente, vc TEM que ter uma boa build, principalmente de antigen, se n vc n consegue fazer literalmente nada. Se vc gostar de jogar de survivor, jogue que é legal. Se vc gostar de killer, não compre o jogo, a não ser que vc tenha muito tempo livre pra grindar.

LONG DESCRIPTION: The best way to describe Dead by Daylight is to compare it to hitting a funny bone. In the beginning, it hurts. As time passes the pain subsides and you go into the slight giddy laughter. Dead by Daylight is one of the few rare combinations of gaming that can be fun to play, and at times an absolute chore. You either choose to play as the Survivor or the Killer. As the Survivor your job is to activate 5 generators while avoiding the killer. You work with your teammates to escape in various maps ranging from an Insane Asylum, an old lumberyard, and more. As the killer your job is as implies. To eliminate the survivors to please the entity. Both killer and survivor have their pros and cons. I personally have enjoyed playing the Survivors with my friends as we all try to keep our sanity. If you are a fan of hide and seek and classic horror movie tropes, give this game a go!

Warning: I would be dismissive not to include the following. This game has been known to have a few players here and there who cheat. Though I haven't encountered any of these cheaters yet (Knock on wood), there are instances of people who have reported hacking. There are also a number of players who tend to cheat the system either by hiding in a corner preventing rescue, or campers and t-baggers. If you are easily offended by reactions such as this, this game may feel tedious at times. However if you are willing to look past this, one can honestly find enjoyment in playing Dead by Daylight.

I have put in only 12 hours on the PC already, and so far I have enjoyed every moment of it. If you're feeling brave to encounter these horrors, hop on to Dead by Daylight!

PROS: 
-Fun Game of Hide and Seek
-Different Survivors for different skills and abilities
-Killer's all original and from popular media
-Holiday Give aways
-Fairly Easy Game mechanics to understand

CONS: 
-Noted Hackers in the Past
-Occasional Times of consistent loses
-Can become tedious playing alone
-MUST BE ONLINE TO PLAY

先月頭に始めたばかりのキラー専ですが、ゲーム性自体は間違いなく面白いものとなっています。
問題は、運営と一部プレイヤーがゲーム性をまるで理解していないこと。後者によるネガキャンなんかも問題ではありますが、それ以上に深刻なのが前者が招くとんでもないバランス調整。
確かにヤバすぎるものはサバイバーでも弱体化してくれますが、基本的に運営はキラーに対してかーなーり厳しいです。
そもそも運営がマッチの回転率を上げたいとして行った発電機の調整なども含めて、基本的にキラーがどんどんキツい調整をしていった結果、キラー自体の人口が大きく減ってしまい、却ってサバのマッチ回転率が落ちているという悪循環や、特定パークに使用率が偏るという状態を引き起こしています。
運営はそのことをま　る　で認識していません。というか、公式がキラーを割と蔑ろにしています。
(サバは逃げきれたからokなど)
運営がこのゲームがそもそもどういうゲームなのかを忘れてしまっている、という点には留意した方がよろしいです。
運によっては正直ゲームになりませんので。
